content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT skipHeader_CSV 
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
          FIRST_ROW = 2,
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True)
);
--https://riyalgen2.blob.core.windows.net/project2/Spotify.csv
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'customer_data2' )
  CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE customer_data2 
  WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://project2@riyalgen2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
  );
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE customer(
   OrderID INT ,
    ProductID INT,
    ProductName VARCHAR(255),
    Category VARCHAR(100),
    Quantity INT,
    Price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    Discount DECIMAL(5, 2),
    TotalAmount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    OrderDate DATE,
    CustomerID INT,
    CustomerName VARCHAR(255),
    ShippingAddress VARCHAR(255),
    PaymentMethod VARCHAR(50),
    Status VARCHAR(50)
)
WITH (
  LOCATION = 'Spoti*',
  DATA_SOURCE = customer_data2,
  FILE_FORMAT = skipHeader_CSV
);

select * from customer
drop EXTERNAL TABLE customer
